name: Data Rush (bigsmallpp)
description:
Data Rush is a fast paced, movement focused First-Person-Shooter with integrated abilities, designed to enhance your movement in order to give you an edge and outplay your opponents.

Currently, there's only one gamemode in place (FFA) but more teambased modes are planned for the final release build. The same goes for featured weapons, where only a click based pistol is present, which most likely won't even make it to the final build.

As the most recent revision is a prototype, pretty much everything is subject to change in the future.
